Posts.Content: Being denied the MUGA, start TCH on the 4th and I'm a bit scared about not having this test because of my family history of heart disease. I have high blood pressure/cholesterol as well. My Onco is trying to find a loop hole...She is a funny lady, giggling about all the ways she "Dupes"the system :) Having an Echo Friday but I'm afraid it's not enough. Insurance companies can be so heartless.
Posts.Title: echo better than muga scan
